Pre-Game Insights: The New York Yankees (83-61) host the Kansas City Royals (79-66) at Yankee Stadium on Wednesday, September 11, 2024.
The Yankees hold a slugging percentage of.436 and earn 5.07 runs per contest (2nd in MLB).
The Royals have a slugging percentage of.415 and score 4.7 runs per game (10th in MLB).
The Yankees' pitching staff has given up 602 runs for the year while having an ERA of 3.80 (543 earned runs conceded).
The Royals have a team ERA of 3.91 and have surrendered 134 home runs this season.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game is played at Yankee Stadium in Bronx, NY, and the betting total is set at 8.5.
The pitchers expected to start are Cole Ragans for the Royals and Luis Gil for the Yankees.
